Load contents of another file into the current file in Vim

Mar 15, 2015
1 minute read

Problem

Need the contents of another file in the current file.

Solution

Vim’s Ex command read.

  :read path/to/needed/file

EDIT: I dislike having to delete the empty line. :0r will replace the current line under the cursor.

Crafted with <3 by John Otander (@4lpine).
</> available on Github.
